file_text_writeln: With this function you can write a new line to an opened text file. In this way you can skip lines or write information on a line by line basis (see example code below).
The id of the file to edit.

{ANY_CODE} var file = file_text_open_write(working_directory + "hiscore.txt");
for (var i = 0; i < 10; ++i;)
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}file_text_write_real(file, scr[i]);
{nbsp_x4}file_text_writeln(file);
{nbsp_x4}file_text_write_string(file, scr_name[i]);
{nbsp_x4}file_text_writeln(file);
{nbsp_x4}}
file_text_close(file);
The above code opens a file for writing and then loops through two arrays, writing each array value to a new line of the file. The file is then closed when the loop has finished.
